casebody.data:
HILL et al. v. EAGLE GLASS MFG. CO. (Circuit Court of Appeals, Fourth Circuit. February 22, 1915.) No. 1289. Appeal from the District Court of the United States for the District of West Virginia, at Philippi. John A Howard, of Wheeling, W. Va., for appellants. John C. Palmer, Jr., and George ft. E. Gilchrist, both of Wheeling, W. Va., for appellee.

Before KNAPP and WOODS, Circuit Judges, and WAÍDDILL, District Judge.

PER CURIAM.

Decree of District Court reversed. 219 Fed. 719, 135 C. C. A. 417. Writ of error to the Supreme Court allowed.
